workflow.name: SMXD - Response actions based on disposition v2
workflow.title: SMXD - Response actions based on disposition v2

properties.name: Azure_AD_userID
properties.description: Local variable. DO NOT MODIFY

properties.name: Duo_GroupID_Suspicious
properties.description:
Group ID can be found using the web gui URL

ex: https://admin-dd952xxx.duosecurity.com/groups/DGB7QxxxxxQI1HF87OXX

properties.name: Duo_GroupID_Malicious
properties.description:
Group ID can be found using the web gui URL

ex: https://admin-dd952xxx.duosecurity.com/groups/DGB7QxxxxxQI1HF87OXX

properties.name: Azure_AD_domain
properties.description: Enter default Azure AD domain.

properties.name: Duo_GroupID_Common
properties.description:
Group ID can be found using the web gui URL

ex: https://admin-dd952xxx.duosecurity.com/groups/DGB7QxxxxxQI1HF87OXX

properties.name: Disposition
properties.description: Common - Suspicious - Malicious

properties.name: AMP_Malicious_GroupName
properties.description: Add AMP Malicious Group Name is you enable the Cisco Secure Endpoint Response

properties.name: Reason
properties.description: Why Observable Risk Score is raised - NOTES

properties.name: AMP_Suspicious_GroupName
properties.description: Add AMP Suspicious Group Name is you enable the Cisco Secure Endpoint Response

Target Group: Default TargetGroup
Target Group Type: HTTP Endpoint, SMTP Endpoint(optional)
Targets Used: CTR_For_Access_Token, Private_CTIA_Target, AMP_Target(optional), Duo(optional), SWC_Target(optional), Azure_For_Access_Token(optional), Azure_Graph_API(optional)

Response module are DISABLE per default. Please turn on Response based on use cases.

Steps:
[] 

More details are available at https://github.com/kcdubois/sxo-secure-meter-xd\n

properties.description: Available for you to add any additional action for this risk score.

properties.body:
